TopicTitle: When your game crashes 3 hours into recording...

Articles.Content:
I just finished recording a Rise of Nations video for my YouTube channel. But I didn't choose to end the recording. I was about 3 hours into the recording. I went to check the recording time and when I tried to click back into the game... it crashed.

3. Hours. Into recording.

Ouch...

On a side not, Rise of Nations? Wow, I think you're the first person I've seen that also plays it, or at least said so. Were you using the ingame recorder?

18 hours ago, Maximus97 said:

Ouch...

On a side not, Rise of Nations? Wow, I think you're the first person I've seen that also plays it, or at least said so. Were you using the ingame recorder?

I have no clue how to use the ingame recorder. I use Open Broadcaster Software for all my recordings.
